title: I dont use cloud. I dont like it. Can I turn it off, or will that stop google from refreshing?
content:
I stopped google cloud apps years ago when I was unable to retrieve pictures of friends, relatives and deceased pets, would not allow me to bring them back to my own phone. 
Now, I curiosily looked into the cloud app, after a new upgrade. Nothing was in it but my photos I do not want there, and yet again, cannot get them off. 

How else does sync affect my phone besides unwantingly put my stuff on the cloud? 
I have memory cards that are 5 billion more times reliable. 
If I stop syncing, will that not allow me to open other apps?
For me, cloud is the worse crap created. I dont want my info floating anywhere beside with me. 
To all out there.... if u CAN MALE IT, someone sure then hell can break into it, and I have already been a casuality of them not living up to their losing over 500 very precious and not replaceable photos of mine.
Now, they have, without me doing a backup, have access to more than 200 photos. 
Regards,
Desperate and pissed.
